video.title: American Weed
video.synopsis: As marijuana gains more acceptance in the U.S., a battle over the legality of medical marijuana dispensaries is waged in Fort Collins, Colorado.

episodes.synopsis: The De Noues face new regulations just as they put more money into their business, and Denver hosts the High Times Medical Cannabis Cup competition.
episodes.title: Green Rush

episodes.synopsis: Denver authorities go undercover to root out black-market marijuana dealers, and entrepreneur Josh Stanley seeks funding for scientific pot research.
episodes.title: Rocky Mountain Medicine

episodes.synopsis: As the unofficial marijuana holiday of April 20th nears, the De Noue family redoubles their efforts to turn the business around.
episodes.title: 4/20 or Bust

episodes.synopsis: A vote threatens Castle Rock's lone dispensary, a cancer patient uses pot to treat his symptoms, and the North Boulder Wellness Center manager quits.
episodes.title: Banned and Busted

episodes.synopsis: Brothers who grow marijuana for dispensaries have a problem on their hands: an enormous crop must be moved to a bigger space so the buds can flower.
episodes.title: Marijuana Drama

episodes.synopsis: The fight against medical marijuana wages on, and the voting results on Proposition 300 will determine if all marijuana dispensaries will be banned.
episodes.title: Weed-Jacked!

episodes.synopsis: Ray Martinez continues to rally his troops against marijuana shops, making Josh Stanley realize that he must fight back to protect his business.
episodes.title: War Over Weed

episodes.synopsis: As election day draws near, anxiety builds for those who are for and against the medical marijuana dispensary ban in Fort Collins, Colorado.
episodes.title: Buds on the Ballot

episodes.synopsis: After a tooth-and-nail campaign to determine the fate of retail marijuana in Fort Collins, Colorado, the day of reckoning finally arrives.
episodes.title: Pot or Not?

episodes.synopsis: A ban jeopardizes the Stanley brothers' business, but the guys are focused on their mission to keep medical marijuana legal for patients in Colorado.
episodes.title: Marijuana Under Fire
